entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
